column1: nna ke ntate hleso khothola kapele
utsebe esale ure re ha mme florencia
ake ure nke kebone dipabi tsena
ke mahlo a sekhowa batho we
hakere uitse umpha kwae kapa umpha
ebe kwae yaka e kae banna
tsebo hana kwae yaka e kae
neuoe oileaenka aeakhella mane jareteng mane
ka nqane pela sefate sane sa heso sekwaetsweng
ha ubone uhlodiya ntho ya mme mamello
nna kebatla nke kere snif snif
ntho etswanang le eno e ho neuoe
tsebo ke mang yaqhadileng kwae yaka
ke mme mang na yaetsebang yaelohileng
hela hoo retloetsang kapisenda ka hona
tlisa lesokwana lena ka fatse fatse
tsebo mpheng jwala bobong ha usabatle hore rebolele ntate
ache ha retsebe hore na letswa kae lona lena
lineo tsamaya hobontsa lieketseng utswa madi
tsebo ke eng ka tsebeng yaka
